ModMetaData.name: Tribal Genetics
ModMetaData.author: Jangles
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds new methods of interacting with the Vanilla Genetics Expanded mechanics, particularly for colonies that aren't technologically advanced enough to research it themselves. 

The new Sacred Genetics meme will give you access to new buildings, roles, and rituals that provide alternative ways of creating genomes, genoframes, and implants. 

CHANGELOG:
 - 1.1: You can now craft genetrainers at the sanctified genetics table if you have VGE - More Lab Stuff installed.
